name: GunFridge
description:
The fruits and veggies are out for blood. Why? Who knows? Not you. All you know is you must kill. Also there's dice.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Arrow keys - shootement

Spacebar - accept-key-for-the-only-menu-in-the-gamement

All art by Swagreus - https://twitter.com/ChooChooPlants
